---
title: Performance Visualizations for the `bbob-noisy` test suite 
---

Below, we provide postprocessed data showing the performance of all [40+ officially supported algorithm data sets](./data-archive.html) for the `bbob-noisy` test suite.

Due to the large amount of algorithms (and the limited space in the figures), we currently group algorithm data sets by year of publication.


## Performance Comparisons per Year

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

import re
import sys
sys.path.insert(1, '../../scripts/')
from IPython.display import Markdown

import cocopp

for year in range(2009, 2030):
	dd = cocopp.bbob_noisy.find(str(year))
	if len(dd) > 1:
		dda = [(re.search('/(.*)', d.partition('_')[0]).group(1)) for d in dd]
		display(Markdown("\n- [{0}](https://numbbo.github.io/ppdata-archive/bbob-noisy/{0}/index.html):".format(year)))
		display(Markdown("{0}".format(', '.join(dda))))

```



## Example code to produce the figures

The Python code to locally generate the second entry, 2010,
above (other entries work respectively) reads

```python
import cocopp               # see https://pypi.org/project/cocopp
cocopp.genericsettings.background = {None: cocopp.archives.bbob_noisy.get_all('2009')}
cocopp.main('bbob-noisy/2010/*')  # will take several minutes to process

```
